data.title: Dave Seaver
data.meta_description: Marion Dave Seaver is a private-practice defense attorney with mainly conservative clients and a dual practice in Chicago and New York. (SVU: "Wet") He once attempted to run for State Senate but lost the election. (SVU: "Abomination") In addition to law school, he also graduated from Harvard...
data.text:
Marion Dave Seaver is a private-practice defense attorney with mainly conservative clients and a dual practice in Chicago and New York. (SVU: "Wet") He once attempted to run for State Senate but lost the election. (SVU: "Abomination")

In addition to law school, he also graduated from Harvard Medical School. (L&O: "House Calls")

Clients[]

Dr. Ellis Heinz (L&O: "House Calls")

Dr. Roger Tate (SVU: "Abomination")

Susan Coyle (SVU: "Families")

Javier Vega (SVU: "Criminal")

Carolyn Spencer (SVU: "Obscene")

Jason King (SVU: "Gone")

Dr. Adam Vaughn (L&O: "Remains of the Day")

Dr. Vincent Prochik (SVU: "Wet")

Jerry Bullard and Cassandra Davina (SVU: "Bombshell")

Michele Nichols (L&O: "12 Seconds")

Appearances[]
